title: Get, renew or revoke a Creator access token

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer app. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: Secret of your developer app. To find the Secret , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: The way of generating the access token. The allowed enum value: authorization_code : To generate the access token by authorization code.

parameters.name: auth_code
parameters.description: The authorization code ( auth_code ) generated by your TikTok account holder authorization URL . The code is valid for 10 minutes and can only be used once. To find out how to get the authorization code based on the type of API you use, see the " Authorization URL " row in Comparing authorization for different APIs .

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: The redirect URL which the client will be directed to. Its value must be the same as the TikTok account holder redirect URL set in the app.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

fields.name: access_token
fields.description: The short-term token for permission verification. The token expires in one day.

fields.name: token_type
fields.description: The type of token. Enum value: Bearer : Bearer token. Anyone in possession of the token can use it to access the associated resources.

fields.name: scope
fields.description: The scope of permissions granted to the access token.

fields.name: expires_in
fields.description: The time remaining until the access token expires, measured in seconds.

fields.name: refresh_token
fields.description: The refresh token, which can be used to renew the access token. The refresh token is valid for one year. Note : Retain this field for access_token renewal.

fields.name: refresh_token_expires_in
fields.description: The time remaining until the refresh token expires, measured in seconds.

fields.name: open_id
fields.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok account.

fields.name: client_id
fields.description: ID of your developer app. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Secret of your developer app. To find the Secret , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

fields.name: grant_type
fields.description: The way of generating the access token. The allowed enum value: refresh_token : To generate the access token by refresh token.

fields.name: refresh_token
fields.description: Refresh token to renew an existing access token. You can obtain the refresh token in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ endpoint when you generate an access token.

fields.name: code
fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: message
fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: data
fields.description: Returned data.

fields.name: access_token
fields.description: The short-term token for permission verification. The token expires in one day.

fields.name: token_type
fields.description: The type of token. Enum value: Bearer : Bearer token. Anyone in possession of the token can use it to access the associated resources.

fields.name: scope
fields.description: The scope of permissions granted to the access token.

fields.name: expires_in
fields.description: The time remaining until the access token expires, measured in seconds.

fields.name: refresh_token
fields.description: The refresh token, which can be used to renew the access token. The refresh token is valid for one year. Note : Retain this field for access_token renewal.

fields.name: refresh_token_expires_in
fields.description: The time remaining until the refresh token expires, measured in seconds.

fields.name: open_id
fields.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok account.

fields.name: Content-Type
fields.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

other_tables.title: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

fields.name: client_id
fields.description: ID of your developer application. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Secret of your developer application. To find the Secret , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

fields.name: access_token
fields.description: The Creator access token that you want to revoke. You can either create a new access token via /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or obtain a renewed access token via /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ .
